page.title: 11THE JOHN MUIR COUNTRY PARK 1
page.content: {Location}The Country Park is mainly located around the Tyne Estuary, but is linked to Dunbar harbour by the Cliff Top Trail. {Vegetation}In the Country Park there is a transition from bare sand to fixed dune grasslands. Strand-line plants are sea sandwort and spear-leaved orache. On the fore dune there is sand couch grass with marram grass dominating the mobile dune. Lyme grass grows where the dune is more stable. Red fescue, birds-foot-trefoil, lady's bedstraw and common ragwort ae common on the fixed dune areas. Between Spike Island and the mainland there is high saltmarsh with saltmarsh rush, sea milkwort and sea aster.
